text.0: as twere with swift exertion of the spirit let the priest speed to the celestial waters.
text.1: the glorious food of varuṇa and mitra to him who spreadeth far this laud i offer.
text.2: adhvaryus he ye ready with oblations and come with longing to the longing waters.
text.3: down on which looks the purpletinted eagle pour ye that flowing wave this day defthanded.
text.4: go to the reservoir o ye adhvaryus worship the waters child with your oblations.
text.5: a consecrated wave he now will give you so press for him the soma rich in sweetness.
text.6: he who shines bright in floods unfed with fuel whom sages worship at their sacrifices.
text.7: give waters rich in sweets child of the waters even those which gave heroic might to indra.
text.8: those in which soma joys and is delighted as a young man with fair and pleasant damsels.
text.9: go thou unto those waters o adhvaryu and purify with herbs what thou infusest.
text.10: so maidens bow before the youthful gallant who comes with love to them who yearn to meet him.
text.11: in heart accordant and in wish oneminded are the adhvaryus and the heavenly waters.
text.12: he who made room for you when fast imprisoned who freed you from the mighty imprecation.
text.13: even to that indra send the meathrich current the wave that gratifies the gods o waters.
text.14: send forth to him the meathrich wave o rivers which is your offspring and a well of sweetness.
text.15: oilbalmed to be implored at sacrifices ye wealthy waters hear mine invocation.
text.16: send forth the rapturegiving wave o rivers which indra drinks which sets the twain in motion.
text.17: the well that springeth from the clouds desirous that wandereth tripleformed distilling transport.
text.18: these winding streams which with their double current like cattleraiders seek the lower pastures.
text.19: waters which dwell together thrive together queens mothers of the world these Ṛṣi honour.
text.20: send forth our sacrifice with holy worship send forth the hymn and prayer for gain of riches.
text.21: for need of sacrifice disclose the udder give gracious hearing to our call o waters.
text.22: for wealthy waters ye control all treasures ye bring auspicious intellect and amṛta.
text.23: ye are the queens of independent riches sarasvatī give full life to the singer.
text.24: when i behold the waters coming hither carrying with them milk and mcath and butter.
text.25: bearing the wellpressed soma juice to indra they harmonize in spirit with adhvaryus.
text.26: rich they are come with wealth for living beings o friends adhvaryus seat them in their places.
text.27: seat them on holy grass ye somabringers in harmony with the offspring of the waters.
text.28: now to this grass are come the longing waters the pious ones are seated at our worship.
text.29: adbvaryus press the soma juice for indra so will the service of the gods be easy.
